comment: The set of (closed) walks on vertex ` X ` of length ` 1 ` as words over the set of vertices is a singleton containing the singleton word consisting of ` X ` iff there is a loop at ` X ` . (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2022.) (Revised by AV, 25-Feb-2022.)
